sentences.en: Ali sprung forwards , imitating the action of one throwing the lasso, then of a strangled lion.
sentences.cn: “一只老虎呢?”阿里点头表示能行.

sentences.en: As an engineer, I liked the look of the lasso idea and bought one.
sentences.cn: 作为一名工程师，我非常喜欢这个套索的创意和外形，所以立刻就买了一个。

sentences.en: Cut it out along the eye's line with Polygonal Lasso Tool.
sentences.cn: 使用多边形套索工具沿着眼角线条将云彩选择并裁剪.

sentences.en: He tried to throw a lasso but he got the rope all fouled up.
sentences.cn: 他想扔出个套索,却把绳子缠在一起了.

sentences.en: Lasso - selecting a character will usually stop them in their tracks.
sentences.cn: 用鼠标点击人物将会停止他的行动.

sentences.en: Likewise, not enough feathering will produce a vivid jagged edge to the lasso area.
sentences.cn: 类似的, 不足的羽化则会导致套索边缘区域出现明显的锯齿.

sentences.en: Now rasterize text layer, select small letters with Polygonal Lasso Tool and lift them a little.
sentences.cn: 此刻rasterize文字层, 选择英文字母与多边形套索工具,并排除她们的很少.

sentences.en: Process Lasso restrains such processes, even if it is multiple applications affecting the CPU at once.
sentences.cn: 拉索过程制约等过程中, 即使它是多种用途的影响CPU的一次.

sentences.en: The cowboy tried to throw a lasso but the rope ran afoul of a branch.
sentences.cn: 这放牛娃想甩绳索,可绳子缠到一根树枝上了.

sentences.en: The Lasso Tool should not be used when using a laptop to file pictures.
sentences.cn: 套索工具在使用笔记本电脑来编发图片时不允许使用.

sentences.en: Use the necessary instrument Polygonal Lasso Tool to outline the mask contour.
sentences.cn: 使用多边形套索工具将面膜部分选中.

sentences.en: Use the same colour to fill range of diagonal strips, drawn with the Polygonal Lasso Tool.
sentences.cn: 使用相同的颜色来填补一系列斜条, 结合使用多边形套索工具画.

sentences.en: Where the Marlboro Man juggled cigarettes with a coiled lasso or a horse, Mr Landers tended to kick about in New England snow.
sentences.cn: 在万宝路男人用一条盘绕的套索或一匹马耍弄香烟之处，兰德斯先生则往往是在新英格兰的雪中游荡。

trans.tran_en: a rope with one end tied in a circle, used to catch cattle and horses, especially in the western US
